p: About 2 kg of the air-dried plant were used. For the extraction of the essential oil, the stems were thrown and the rest of the plant (leaves and flowers) was subjected to the hydrodistillation for 4 h by using Clevenger apparatus. The obtained oil was yellowish with characteristic odor; it was then separated from the distillate and stored in sealed glass vial at 4 °C until the moment of analysis. The essential oil was obtained in a yield of 0.4% (w/w).
